alert.note: Alert for Geneva; Houston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 1:35PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Geneva, south central Houston, northwestern Jackson and Holmes Counties through 215 PM CDT... At 134 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Slocomb to 8 miles southwest of Geneva. Movement was south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Graceville, Geneva, Hartford, Slocomb, Malvern, Esto, Madrid, Westville, Campbellton, Noma, Black, Kellys Crossroads, Cerrogordo, Garretts Crossroads, Tendil Crossing, Southern Junction, Gritney, Arrant Settlement, Geneva Municipal A/P and Holland Crossroads. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
